amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect Medicare's guaranteed benefits and to prohibit replacing guaranteed benefits with the House passed budget plan to turn Medicare into a voucher program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 432 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 3. Record Vote Number: 48.

action.text: Amendment SA 432 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Stabenow.
